participant_1.background:
I work in an office as a secretary.
I graduated from college last year.
I was on the soccer team in college.
My name is lucy.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy cooking.
I like to listen to country music.
I am unable to work at a job because of a disability.
I am a vegan.
I like to knit hats for babies in the hospital.

content.text: Hi, my name is Lucy! What's your name?
Hi Lucy, my name is Karen!
It's nice to meet you, Karen! What do you do for fun?
I enjoy cooking, listening to country music, and knitting hats for babies in the hospital.
That's awesome! I love cooking too, but I'm not very good at it. I love listening to country music as well, but I'm not sure if I'm good at knitting.
I'm sure you'd be great at it! It's not as hard as it looks.
I'll have to give it a try sometime. What's your favorite country song?
My favorite country song is "The Dance" by Garth Brooks. It's such a beautiful song.
I love that song! It's so sad but so beautiful.
I know, right? It's one of my all-time favorites.
What do you do for work?
I'm unable to work at a job because of a disability, but I enjoy knitting hats for babies in the hospital.
That's really nice of you! I'm sure the babies love them.
I'm glad I met you, Karen. You seem like a really nice person.
You too, Lucy. It was nice talking to you!
